definition: as much as possible/to the greatest extent
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: I would try to maximize my combat capability, as long as this process goes on," he said.
sentences.chinese: 只要這個過程還在繼續，我就會盡量加大戰鬥能力。

sentences.english: I'll be as prim as I can and not get into any scrapes , if I can help it.
sentences.chinese: 我會盡量板着面孔，不去闖禍，如果我能做到的話。

sentences.english: Therefore, we will try to re-election of your style with a similar style to help you adjust.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們會盡量再你選的款式的類似款式內幫你調劑。

sentences.english: It is to these various reproaches that I shall endeavour to reply today;
sentences.chinese: 今天，我將盡量來答覆這些不同的指責。

sentences.english: I will try to get something more pronounciation oriented soon.
sentences.chinese: 我會盡量讓更多的讀音爲導向很快。

sentences.english: But I tend to be protective of my guests.
sentences.chinese: 但我也會盡量保護我的嘉賓們。

sentences.english: "Turkey first of all would try to keep balance, " Emre said.
sentences.chinese: “土耳其的一切都會盡量保持平衡首先，”埃姆雷說。

sentences.english: I'll try to make it as interesting as I humanly can do.
sentences.chinese: 我會盡量講得生動一些。

sentences.english: Each layer does its best to conceal its inner workings.
sentences.chinese: 每一層都會盡量去隱匿其內部的工作。

sentences.english: If I see a chance, I'll try not to miss it.
sentences.chinese: 如果我看見一個機會，我會盡量不錯失良機了。

sentences.english: Because others who did not prepare will try to take away what you have.
sentences.chinese: 因爲別人誰沒有準備會盡量帶走什麼，你。

sentences.english: Therefore, we should all strive to learn as much as we can and broaden our horizons .
sentences.chinese: 因此我們皆應努力盡量多學習並增廣我們的見識。

sentences.english: I'll go shopping, and I'll try to make it back for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 我要去買東西，會盡量在晚餐前趕回來。

sentences.english: I will do that for you as soon as Ihave fixed the machine.
sentences.chinese: 一修好呆板我就會盡量加快爲你完成阿誰工作。

sentences.english: And I will try to keep them amusing.
She'd try not to be bitter, try not to be too much of a widow.
sentences.chinese: 她會盡量不去想苦日子，不去想太多寡婦的生活。

definition: as much as possible/to the greatest extent
to avoid/to evade/to keep away from
in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
